Posts.Content: Have just a few quesitons...about a year ago I had a benign tumor removed from my breat...because of bloody type discharge...it was not pure blood, however I haven't had a problem until now...there is pure blood coming out of my breat when I express it or by itself while I am sleeping. What should I do...I just don't want anymore bad news.?. Thanks for you replies and responses... bec
Posts.Title: Pure Blood Discharge

Posts.Content: Does anyone know about how they actually removed the entire duct? I am having surgery next Friday, but I can't get a firm answer on the actual surgery or how the procedure will occur.
Posts.Title: Breast Duct Removal

Posts.Content: I had the same problem last year and actually had surgery to remove a benign tumor...although I actually had blood coming from my nipple along with a dark greenish, milky substance. I still have the discharge and although it is not bloody anymore it is still dark green and I am actually going to call my doctor today ask him about it again. Bec
Posts.Title: nipple discharge....Worried!
